subject_terms_3: Force 136 (Guerilla movement) 1942-1945 Japanese occupation Lung, Chiu Ying
physical_appearance: This is a set of two badges from Force 136. The top one is rectangular shaped, and striped in the colours blue, yellow, red and light blue. The badge below it is in the shape of a circle. Within it, there is a bird with outstretched wings against a beige background. Underneath the bird, there is a red flame pattern. The thread on the right of the badge is slightly frayed.
title_text: Lung Chui Ying Collection: Force 136 badge ????? Lung Chiu Ying Collection: Force 136 badge
subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Great Britain. Army. Force 136 Force 136 (Guerilla movement) Wings (Insignia)
